attributes.action: Hold an immediate referendum asking whether Britain pulls out of the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The referendum should ask one simple question: Should Britain pull out of the European Union? This should be the question put to the people.  There should not be any other question or modification of the question that could possibly cause confusion over what is being asked. No spin! Just a simple question: "Should Britain pull out of the European Union?"

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
